CheckTitle: Ensure alert is configured for kms key changes
Description: Ensures that an alert is configured in SLS to monitor and notify on KMS key configuration changes.
Risk: Unauthorized KMS key changes can compromise data encryption or lead to data loss.

Recommendation.Text: Create and enable an alert in SLS to monitor kms key changes from ActionTrail logs.

Notes: This check looks for enabled alerts that monitor kms key changes.
